s1.title: Risk-free conditional smart payments
s1.sub-title: Byteball allows you to do something that traditional currencies can't: $t(s1.a-conditional)
s1.p: You set a condition when the payee receives the money. If the condition is not met, you get your money back.

s2.title: P2P payments in chat
s2.sub-title: Chat and pay in the same app.

s3.title: Prediction markets
s3.sub-title: Make money by correctly predicting future events.
s3.p1: Create a P2P smart contract that can be unlocked if a specific event occurs. Use it for betting on price movements, sports betting, and insurance.
s3.p2: Find your counterpart in #prediction_markets channel on our Slack.

s4.title: P2P insurance
s4.p1: Buy insurance from peers to get paid in case a negative event occurs. Sell insurance for profit.
s4.p2: Insurance is just a simple smart contract that can be unlocked by the insured — if the event in question did occur, or by the insurer — otherwise.
s4.p3: To insure against flight delay, find your counterpart in #p2p_insurance channel on our Slack, create a contract, and if your flight arrives late, chat with flight delays oracle to have it post the data about the delay, then unlock the contract.

s5.title: P2P betting
s5.sub-title: Bet against other users on sports events.
s5.p1: Find your counterpart in #prediction_markets channel on our Slack and create a contract that can be unlocked by you or your peer depending on the results of a future game.
s5.p2: After the result is known, chat with sports oracle to have it post the data about the outcome, then unlock the contract.

s6.title: Chatbots
s6.sub-title: Talk to a bot like you would talk to a human.
s6.p1: Shop by chatting with a merchant's bot, pay in two clicks. Exchanges and other services are also easy to use in conversational interface.

s7.title: Bot store
s7.sub-title: Easily discover and add new chatbots via the built-in Bot store.
s7.p1: Developers have instant access to all users by publishing their chatbot in the Bot store. See the developer guide about building chatbots.

s8.title: Untraceable currency: Blackbytes
s8.p1: When you want complete privacy, pay in Blackbytes, a cash-like untraceable currency whose transactions are not visible on the public database, they are sent peer-to-peer instead.
s8.p2: Use built in TOR switch straight from the wallet to increase you privacy even further.

s9.title: Users help each other
s9.p1: There is no central entity that stores and processes all the payments.  Instead, transactions created by users are cryptographically linked to each other, and once you add your new transaction, other users start adding theirs on top of yours, and the number of other transactions that link to your transaction grows like snowball (that's why we call it Byteball).
